titles.name: Raphael Rocha
titles.title: Software Engineer | React Native | React | Node

certifications: Deep Discovery Advanced Threat Detection 3.3 Certified Professional

awards: Winner of the first Hackathon Insern 2021
summary: Software developer with more than three years of experience in web and mobile front-end using the react and react-native stack. I worked on some projects using Node and maintaining applications with a large flow of users. I am communicative, open to new professional experiences and challenges. I believe in teamwork and in an environment where everyone can help each other to have a higher quality result. Specialist in FDM 3D printers.

experience.description: Trainee in Trend Micro's IT security certification program. Two months with classes about cloud computing, cloud security, ethical hacking, LGPD, overview about cybersecurity ,exams and tests every week and three cybersecurity certifications.

experience.company: Casa Civil do Governo do Estado do Pará
experience.description: Management of the civil house network in the state of Pará. Application of improvements in the internal protocols and structure of the governor's palace.

CEO and founding partner for three years of startup Lab3D, the first startup of training and manufacturing of 3D printers in the north of Brazil. Last position as Manager of project development, working with digital manufacturing, automation in rapid prototyping machinery, leadership, design and innovation.
